Description: All methods are static.  Consider using a utility class instead. Alternatively, you could add a private constructor or make the class abstract to silence this warning.
To avoid mistakes add a comment at the beginning of the scan field if you want a default access modifier
Use explicit scoping instead of the default package private level
Public method and constructor comments are required
Use one line for each declaration, it enhances code readability.
Avoid using if...else statements without curly braces
